trans-unit.target: TEXT_SUBWIL099_00531_SEQ_00<tab>Hamund is looking for someone to make a delivery.
TEXT_SUBWIL099_00531_SEQ_01<tab>It seems miners are being sought at Black Brush Station for temporary employment. Take Hamund's application to Beringaer at Black Brush.
TEXT_SUBWIL099_00531_SEQ_02<tab>Beringaer has added Hamund's name to the list, but the work promises to be grueling and low paying. Are Thanalan's refugees fated to be exploited and thrown away?
TEXT_SUBWIL099_00531_TODO_00<tab>Deliver Hamund's application to Beringaer at Black Brush Station.
TEXT_SUBWIL099_00531_HAMUND_000<tab>Don't suppose ye'd be willin' to do a favor for a miner down on his luck, would ye?
TEXT_SUBWIL099_00531_HAMUND_001<tab>Rumor is, a man named Beringaer at Black Brush Station is lookin' to take on miners. I'd go see him myself, but my wife's been taken ill and needs tendin' to.
TEXT_SUBWIL099_00531_HAMUND_002<tab>If ye'd be so kind as to take my application to this Beringaer fellow, I'd be in yer debt.
TEXT_SUBWIL099_00531_BERINGAER_011<tab>Another miner lookin' for work, is it? Let's see... Everythin' looks to be in order. All right, I'll go ahead an' add him to the list.
TEXT_SUBWIL099_00531_BERINGAER_012<tab>These refugees are a bloody Twelvesend. They break their backs for next to nothin'. And when they're washed up, there's always another to take their spot!

TEXT_SUBWIL099_00531_BERINGAER_013<tab>The poor fools dig up pebbles worth more'n they'll see in their whole lifetime. Eorzea can be a right cruel place at times, but I ain't one to change what ain't broke.
